description: Polycarbonate helmet shell is the primary protective component of a helmet that is commonly used in structural firefighting operations.
short desc: Polycarbonate helmet shell is the primary protective component of a helmet worn by firefighters.
source: Sampled from the brim of a polycarbonate helmet worn by firefighters.

measured property.test description: Initial-mass-normalized mass loss rate [1/s] was measured in the simultaneous thermal analyzer experiments at three heating rates: 3 K/min, 10 K/min, and 30 K/min.
